resources.string: Making voice input simpler and more efficient
Main keyboard interface with microphone, post-processing toggle, edit panel entry, and more
Powerful text editing features including cursor movement, text selection, copy/paste, AI processing, and more
Number and punctuation input panel with Chinese/English punctuation toggle
Press and hold the microphone button to start recording, release to transcribe
Support multiple preset templates to make recognition results more accurate
Quick switch input methods or perform floating ball voice recognition

【Main Keyboard Features】
• Microphone Button (center): Press and hold to record, release to transcribe speech to text
• Edit Panel Entry (top-left): Tap to enter edit panel
• Enable Post-processing: Toggle AI post-processing on/off
• Hide Keyboard: Minimize keyboard interface
• Backspace: Swipe up/left to delete all, swipe down to undo last change
• Settings: Open application settings
• Switch Input Method: Quick switch to other keyboards
• Enter: Send newline
• Custom Punctuation: Four customizable punctuation keys at bottom

【Edit Panel Features】
• Microphone Button (center): Press and hold to record voice commands, LLM will modify content based on commands (AI Edit feature)
• Back to Main: Exit edit panel
• Apply Preset Prompt: Select AI template and process current text
• Cursor Movement: Move cursor left/right, long-press for continuous movement
• Move to Start/End: Quick jump to text beginning/end
• Selection Mode: Enable to select text while moving cursor
• Select All: Select all text
• Copy/Paste: Text copy and paste functions
• Backspace: Delete characters, supports gestures (same as main keyboard)
• Number & Symbol Keyboard: Switch to number/symbol input panel

【Number & Symbol Keyboard】
• Number Row: Quick input for digits 0-9
• Punctuation Symbols: Two rows of common punctuation marks
• CN/EN Toggle: Switch between Chinese/English punctuation
• Space/Enter/Backspace: Basic input functions
• Back to Edit Panel: Exit number keyboard
Enable permissions as needed. You can skip any item now and configure it later.
These are recommended for basic voice input workflow.
These improve compatibility and stability in specific scenarios.
Enable BiBi Keyboard in system input-method settings.
Open input-method picker and switch current keyboard to BiBi Keyboard.
Required to record audio for speech recognition.
Required when using floating-ball voice input.
Improves text insertion compatibility for floating-ball mode.
Used for background service and download notifications.
Pick a mode that fits your needs. You can change it later in settings.
You can choose whether to enable anonymous analytics for product improvement.
No recognition text or personal content will be uploaded. This can be changed anytime.
Learn more about the project and available editions.
